p: The management of patients considered infected depends on their symptoms. In asymptomatic patients, it is reasonable to propose quarantine at home and careful telephone monitoring of symptoms. Patients with mild symptoms, such as slight-fever, cough and mild asthenia, should be early hospitalized in CC facilities, since they can deteriorate rapidly. Telemedicine would also allow for prompt treatment of COVID-19 patients with cancer right in their homes with prophylactic heparin treatment and other drugs employed in hospital settings during the early phase of the disease.
